copy.title: Button Search
copy.instruction0: Locate the buttons you need to find.
copy.instruction1: Click and drag the buttons you need into the pink pouch and drop them in.
copy.instruction2: Find all the buttons you need before time runs out!
copy.instruction3: If you get stuck, use the hint button for some help.
copy.quit_confirm_question: Are you sure you want to give up?
copy.title: Tailoring
copy.subtitle: Button Search
copy.place_correct_Mendy_3: We have a real eye for finding buttons!
copy.place_wrong_Mendy_1: Close but not quite. Let's try again!
copy.place_wrong_Bobbin_2: I know ya can figure out where the right button is!
copy.place_wrong_Mendy_2: Let's look carefully. Where could that button be?
copy.place_wrong_Bobbin_4: Are ya really sure that looks right?
copy.place_wrong_Mendy_4: Hmmm... Let's think about that one again.
copy.timer_start_Bobbin_1: Get ready, here come the buttons!
copy.timer_start_Mendy_2: It's time to find our buttons!
copy.hint_Mendy_1: Here's a bit of a hint.
copy.next_level_Bobbin_1: Don't stop now! Ya got more to do!
copy.next_level_Mendy_1: We have no time to waste, my dear. On to find more buttons!
copy.last_level_Mendy_1: These are last buttons we need. Let us finish in style!
copy.end_poor_Bobbin_1: Um-hmm-well, good try! I betcha you'll find the buttons better next time!
copy.end_poor_Mendy_1: Let's continue, shall we? We'll find those buttons better next time I'm sure, my dear.
copy.end_poor_Bobbin_2: Keep trying! You'll get better at finding buttons, I know ya will!
copy.end_poor_Mendy_2: We tried our best, didn't we, my dear? And remember, we can always try button search again!
copy.end_poor_Bobbin_3: Keep thinking happy thoughts! I know ya can find buttons better next time!
copy.end_poor_Mendy_3: Let's not lose heart. Finding buttons gets easier with practice, my dear, truly it does.
copy.end_poor_Bobbin_4: All it takes is a teensy bit more practice, and then you'll find buttons like a pro!
copy.end_poor_Mendy_4: Finding those buttons sure can be a real challenge. There's always next time to do better, my dear!
copy.end_good_Bobbin_1: Nice job! Have ya looked for these buttons before?
copy.end_good_Mendy_1: Not bad button searching, my dear, not bad at all!
copy.end_good_Mendy_2: Our button searching skills are improving, my dear. Well done!
copy.end_good_Bobbin_3: Well, you're good with this button searching stuff!
copy.end_good_Mendy_3: Mmm, we certainly have quite a knack for finding buttons, don't we?
copy.end_good_Bobbin_4: Ya know, you're awful good with this button finding stuff!
copy.end_good_Mendy_4: Splendid job, my dear. We're on our way to finding all the buttons we need!
copy.end_great_Bobbin_1: Wow-wee! Ya sure you're not a button expert?
copy.end_great_Mendy_1: It looks as if we have quite a touch for button searching!
copy.end_great_Bobbin_2: I'd call that a pretty button-tastic job! Ya did great!
copy.end_great_Mendy_2: We're quite impressed! Quite impressed indeed.
copy.end_great_Bobbin_3: You've been practicing, haven't ya? I knew it! Great job!
copy.end_great_Mendy_3: We feel so proud. This is quite splendid work!
copy.end_great_Bobbin_4: What button-rific work! I'm not sure I could have done better myself!
copy.end_great_Mendy_4: We've been practicing our button searching, haven't we? Lovely work!
copy.end_awesome_Bobbin_1: Okay, I mean it - you're sure you're not a button detective?
copy.end_awesome_Mendy_1: My dear, what utterly amazing button finding skills we have!
copy.end_awesome_Bobbin_2: Ya sure finished finding those buttons in a flit! Great job!
copy.end_awesome_Mendy_2: This just goes to show that practice does make perfect, doesn't it?
copy.end_awesome_Bobbin_3: I think you're a button searching master!
copy.end_awesome_Mendy_3: Truly astounding, my dear! We couldn't have found those buttons better!
copy.end_awesome_Bobbin_4: Pleat my wings, you're a button searching wonder!
copy.end_awesome_Mendy_4: We simply adore your work! Superb job!
